description: Chicken Opn5L1 E177K/Q192K mutant was expressed in HEK293T, regenerated by all-trans-retinal, solubilized by dodecyl maltoside, and purified using Rho1D4 antibody-conjugated Sephalose. Semi-quantitative targeted analyses of trypsinized Opn5L1 with or without light irradiation were carried out using reverse phase LC-ESI-MSn to detect light-dependent formation of retinal-cysteine adduct. The results were analyzed by Mass++, mMass and Igor Pro softwares.

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Sato K, Yamashita T, Ohuchi H, Takeuchi A, Gotoh H, Ono K, Mizuno M, Mizutani Y, Tomonari S, Sakai K, Imamoto Y, Wada A, Shichida Y Opn5L1 is a retinal receptor that behaves as a reverse and self-regenerating photoreceptor. Nat Commun. 2018 Mar 28;9(1):1255

title: Retinal-cysteine adduct in Opn5L1
